messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo crew, i'd like you to all look at the newscaster and read bumps News, it's great so far!

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Listen if you see anything news worthy please tell me

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that all of the station's bots/animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Maintenance.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm alive, I'm ce the acting cap. moff blew up SM and the bridge. Lets get out

messages.author: Bumps (Chief Engineer)
messages.body:
No cap on the scence. Well guess who's taking over. It's the HOP as the new cap, and just look at her clothes. Damn they look both hot in there, and their clothes look sexy (and tasty to eat).
This whore is gonna be running our ship, so don't mess around with them unless you want a taste of space law.

comments.author: Rose White (Virologist)
comments.body: I think this is gonna get a taste of space law
